One of our middle school paraprofessionals wrote her own poem to align with the Grade 8 Unit on Poetry. It is beautifully written.

Every day my heart hurts
because you are not there

I scan the names, view

the video pictures

I see some friends

and yet some

are not there.

Your voice I miss

the way you

get up a dozen times

just to sharpen a pencil

down to its nub

and then ask me

for another.

I have a whole collection

just waiting in my drawer

Yet we can‚Äôt go back

and when we do

You will be

somewhere else

and not with me.

You will grow

and move on
and my pencils will go

to yet another

who asks me for my help

and I will think of you

and wonder whether

someone else will give you

the sharp attention you deserve.

Janice Mlynar Andrews

April 2020

Thank you so much for your support and see you on the trails on September 29th!!
